fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Break someone’s back at night, paralyzing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Paralyzed players will lose the last line of their attributes every night, until they have none left, in which they become roleblocked until Renesmee dies. Players do not know when they lose lines.
Vampire Fixation: You may target two players per night. Retargetting an already paralyzed player either removes an additional line from them, or blackmails them if they’ve already lost all of their attributes.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
